mapper.insert: insert into power (power_id, power_name, created_at, updated_at, power_description) values (#{powerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{powerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{powerDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into power
power_id,
power_name,
created_at,
updated_at,
power_description,
